page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: The styles and ages of the buildings in Burton Lazars varies considerably.The materials include brick,stone,wood,slate,tile and thatch.The church is part Norman while the newest building is still under construction.Some buildings display an interesting combination of different styles and materials.One in particular including stone,concrete and brick (both bare and painted and in various bonds). Previous uses of some of the older buildings can be detected from their names.For instance a bakery and stables.Other information to be found in house names includes a reminder of the area's strong hunting associations in the two neighbouring pairs of houses named after the four famous local hunts (Belvoir, Cottesmore, Fernie and Quorn.)
